name: react-native-nitro-dns
description: Blazing-fast Node.js `dns` for React Native. Built with Nitro (JSI) & Rust, supporting DoH/DoT/DoQ and global native network interception.
author: iwater <iwater@gmail.com>

scripts.copy-clib: rm -rf ios/Frameworks/RNDns.xcframework && cp -R ../rust_c_dns/target/xcframework/RNDns.xcframework ios/Frameworks/ && mkdir -p android/libs/arm64-v8a android/libs/armeabi-v7a android/libs/x86 android/libs/x86_64 && cp ../rust_c_dns/target/aarch64-linux-android/release/librust_c_dns.so android/libs/arm64-v8a/ && cp ../rust_c_dns/target/armv7-linux-androideabi/release/librust_c_dns.so android/libs/armeabi-v7a/ && cp ../rust_c_dns/target/i686-linux-android/release/librust_c_dns.so android/libs/x86/ && cp ../rust_c_dns/target/x86_64-linux-android/release/librust_c_dns.so android/libs/x86_64/ && cp ../rust_c_dns/include/dns_ffi.h cpp/
scripts.copy-clib-android: cp ../rust_c_dns/target/aarch64-linux-android/release/librust_c_dns.so android/libs/arm64-v8a/ && cp ../rust_c_dns/target/armv7-linux-androideabi/release/librust_c_dns.so android/libs/armeabi-v7a/ && cp ../rust_c_dns/target/i686-linux-android/release/librust_c_dns.so android/libs/x86/ && cp ../rust_c_dns/target/x86_64-linux-android/release/librust_c_dns.so android/libs/x86_64/ && cp ../rust_c_dns/include/dns_ffi.h cpp/
